title: DPM Dar directs for timely, effective implementation of projects for 2022 floods affectees’ recovery, reconstruction
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 08 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister (DPM/FM) Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Wednesday gave directions for timely and effective implementation of projects for recovery, and reconstruction to ensure continued support
The deputy prime minister chaired a follow-up meeting to review donor assistance pledged for the 2022 floods, a DPM’s Office news release said.
The Committee took stock of ongoing projects under the development assistance pledged by multilateral and bilateral partners.
The meeting was attended by the Ministers for Planning, Development and Special Initiative, Climate Change, SAPM Tariq Bajwa, along with the concerned senior government officials and representatives.
